channel.title: Veronica Alvarenga on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Veronica Alvarenga on Simba Tango

item.title: It can be fun, too!
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
Just because tango can be deep and serious, doesn’t mean it can’t be a lot of fun, too.

I remember learning very early about the three musical genres: milonga was fun, tango serious and vals about love…

…so no coincidence that two out of three are milongas:

httpv://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=98CmUhcJWbwhttpv://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=98CmUhcJWbw

httpvh://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=97B2vGyZ6j0

httpvh://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=S-mkR-KoPts
